detail_desc: Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and at the crotch, short sleeves and short legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a yoke at the back.

Suit trousers in a felted wool blend. Extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. The wool content of the trousers is recycled.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Cropped crocheted top in soft cotton with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a rain jacket and pair of rain trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Jacket with a detachable hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a reflective detail at the back. Lined. Trousers with an elasticated waist, adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the hems, and reflective detail on one leg. Lined. The jacket and trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a motif. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Top in print-striped sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Push-up microfibre bra with decorative straps and a metal ring at the front, and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Gentle lift.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted coat in recycled wool and recycled polyester with notch lapels. Chest pocket, diagonal welt side pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit cotton blend.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Wide, calf-length parka in a rustle weave with seams at the top, a hood with an elastic drawstring and a high collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and a seam with a concealed, elastic drawstring at the waist. Diagonal front pockets, an elastic drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt in jersey and pair of shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline and visible seams around the sleeves and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and a back pocket.
Metal rings in various designs.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Small pouch bag with appliqués, and a zip at the top. Size 5x9x13 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a deep V-neck front and back with pleats and covered buttons at the front. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a flared skirt that has a gathered seam half way down and is longer at the back. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and a high slit in one side.
Calf-length plumeti skirt with an elasticated drawstring waist and flounced hem. Lined.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening. Soft linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw edges and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with lacing at the sides and a concealed zip at the back. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Multifunctional hair accessory in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with a large, sewn-on bow and long, wide ties. Can be worn as a classic hairband, as a scarf around a ponytail or as a tie belt. Length of ties approx. 74 cm.
Tights with a mid waist. 60 denier. Some of the polyamide content of the tights is recycled.
Knee-socks in a fine-knit cotton blend.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with open sides and heel straps with covered elastication. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Imitation suede trainers with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a discreet loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Width of brim 4.5 cm. The cotton content of the hat is partly recycled.
Kids Exclusive. Shirt jacket in soft, organic cotton corduroy with a collar, press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, patch front pockets and long sleeves. Unlined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a spotted cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a wide, detachable tie belt, pleats at the front, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners and side pockets.
Imitation leather trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front, padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a concealed zip in one side and scalloped hem. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION/PREMUM QUALITY. Double-breasted, ankle-length trenchcoat woven in a wool blend with notch lapels, front pockets with decorative stitching, and an inner pocket. Detachable belt at the waist that goes through the pocket opening and can be fastened both inside and out. Gentle flare to the hem and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Wide, short-sleeved top in a textured weave.
Sleeveless top in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and gathers at the sides for best fit.

Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey with narrow, elasticated shoulder straps, a V-neck, draping at the top and a high slit at one side of the front. Lined over the bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Small umbrella with a telescopic handle and a fabric wrist strap. Size 7x15.5 cm folded.
Short suede skirt with a visible zip at the back and seam at the hem. Lined.
Short polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured rubber soles.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets, seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Flared top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
5-pocket jeans with a regular waist, button fly and tapered legs with twisted, shaping seams.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Windbreaker in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a mesh-lined drawstring hood, a zip down the front and welt side pockets. Elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with multicoloured side stripes. Adjustable elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Slim fit.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
